text: @realDonaldTrump So when did #FLOTUS take that Coronavirus test?? You looked like a deer in the headlights when asked by the reporter. Isn't she busy directing the workers on the building the Tennis Courts??? Show us the proof she took the test--I doubt she did. Another lie!
